body_content.explanation: to control something or someone to your advantage, often unfairly or dishonestly:
examples: Throughout her career she has very successfully manipulated the media.
The opposition leader accused government ministers of manipulating the statistics to suit themselves.

body_content.explanation: to control something using the hands:
examples: The wheelchair is designed so that it is easy to manipulate.

body_content.explanation: to treat a part of the body, using the hands to push back bones into the correct position and put pressure on muscles:
examples: The doctor manipulated the base of my spine and the pain disappeared completely.
